ValidationRule.description: Checks to make sure C/E Account information is provided is box is checked indicating they have a C/E account in ISNetworld.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISCHANGED( LastActivityDate )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Activity_Type__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Date_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Subject_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Type_Account__c ) )) && ( Has_C_E_Account_in_ISN__c = True ) && ISBLANK( C_E_Account_Name_ID__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Account Name(s) and ID(s) for the C/E accounts.
